Pre-Game Insights: Belarus have conceded an average of 1.4 goals per game in their last 10 international matches.
Bulgaria have drawn five of their last six games but failed to keep a clean sheet in any of them.
Max Ebong is Belarus’s top scorer with five international goals, while Bulgaria’s Kiril Despodov leads with 14 goals.
Bulgaria’s defensive fragility has been exposed throughout their recent fixtures, having conceded 14 goals in eight Euro 2024 qualification matches.
Belarus have failed to keep a clean sheet in their last four international fixtures, shipping four goals in two of those matches.
Bulgaria’s average of 10.5 shots per game indicates they will pressure Belarus’s defence throughout the match.
